children.name: section
children.label: /// Section Settings
children.inline_help_text: A "section" is the outermost grouping that helps holds together the column structure.

children.name: type
children.label: Background Type:
children.inline_help_text: Note: If you select VIDEO, open the CONTENTS tab to upload your clip.

children.name: animated_gradient
children.label: Animated Gradient:
children.inline_help_text: Bring the gradient to life.

children.name: image
children.label: Background Image:
children.inline_help_text: Tip: Optimize your images (1920px width max)

children.name: add_overlay
children.label: Want to add an Overlay?
children.help_text: This can help pop the text off the background.

children.name: full_screen_bg
children.label: Full Screen Background
children.inline_help_text: Turn this on and the background will take up the entire height of the browser window.

children.name: use_scroll_down
children.label: Use Scroll Down Animation
children.inline_help_text: Turn this on to indicate there is more content lower on the page.

children.name: add_wave
children.label: Add "The Wave" (Design Accent)
children.inline_help_text: This is a cool page design element that can give your page a sense of flow and movement.

children.name: add_wave_top
children.label: Add a Wave/Angle to the Top

children.name: type
children.label: What type of Wave do you want?
children.inline_help_text: Select a few options to see the variations.

children.name: color
children.label: Wave Color
children.help_text: If the row above has a white background you'll want to set the color of the way to white.
children.inline_help_text: Set this to the same color as the row above.

children.name: add_wave_bottom
children.label: Add a Wave/Angle to the Bottom

children.name: type
children.label: What type of Wave do you want?
children.inline_help_text: Select a few options to see the variations.

children.name: color
children.label: Wave Color
children.help_text: If the row below has a white background you'll want to set the color of the way to white.
children.inline_help_text: Set this to the same color as the row below.

children.name: row
children.label: /// Row Settings
children.inline_help_text: A "row" is the innermost grouping that helps holds together the column structure.

children.name: type
children.label: Background Type:
children.inline_help_text: Note: If you select VIDEO, open the CONTENTS tab to upload your clip(s).

children.name: animated_gradient
children.label: Animated Gradient:
children.inline_help_text: Bring the gradient to life.

children.name: image
children.label: Background Image:
children.inline_help_text: Tip: Optimize your images (1920px width max)

children.name: add_overlay
children.label: Want to add an Overlay?
children.help_text: This can help pop the text off the background.

children.name: add_full_bleed
children.label: Add "Full Bleed"
children.inline_help_text: Removes the space on the left and right edges of the screen.

children.name: remove_col_gutter
children.label: Remove Space Between Columns
children.inline_help_text: Removes space between columns if you have more than one so they sit flush next to one another.

children.name: z_index
children.label: Layer Control (z-index)
children.help_text: This feature is very useful when you have a Parallax Element which scrolls over other modules.
children.inline_help_text: This allows you to push the content back or bring it forward in relation to surrounding modules. Note: Use the Previewer to see the effect.

children.name: desktop
children.label: //////// Desktop:
children.inline_help_text: Sets the spacing for screen sizes above 992px

children.name: tablet
children.label: //////// Tablet:
children.inline_help_text: Sets the spacing for screen sizes between 575-992px.

children.name: mobile
children.label: //////// Mobile:
children.inline_help_text: Sets the spacing for screen sizes below 575px

children.name: video_size
children.label: Video Size
children.inline_help_text: Set the max width of the video that will be displayed in the modal pop-up.

children.name: bg_color
children.label: Background Color
children.inline_help_text: This only applies if you have content under each video.

name: start
label: â‡’ START HERE
inline_help_text: This sets how many videos you'd like on each row before the video breaks on the next line.

children.name: num_vids
children.label: Number of Videos in each Row:

children.name: vid_display
children.label: How do you want the videos displayed?
choices: Open larger in pop-up modal when thumbnail is clicked.

children.name: col_space
children.label: Space between columns:
children.help_text: Under the STYLES Tab in the Row Settings > Size Options there is a toggle to remove the space between the columns. That will override this setting.  You can also set this to 0px for the same effect.
children.inline_help_text: Sets the space between the videos or thumbnails. See the tool-tip as there is a setting under the Style tab that can override this.

children.name: play_btn
children.label: Show Play Button on Hover:
children.inline_help_text: Look under the STYLES tab if you want to change the color of the play button.

children.name: add_filter
children.label: Add Filter Dropdown
children.inline_help_text: This allows you to easily categorize your videos so they can be filtered.

children.name: filter
children.label: Filter
children.inline_help_text: To use filters, go into each thumbnail card and add the filters you'd like to use. Those will automatically show up in the dropdown list.

children.name: video_label
children.label: Video Label:
children.inline_help_text: This is for organizational purposes only. Will not display on your website.
children.placeholder: This will help you organize the list...

children.name: thumb
children.label: Thumbnail Image:
children.inline_help_text: Recommended size: (760 x 428px) or if you have more than three per row try (380 x 214px).

children.name: embed
children.label: Video Embed Code:
children.inline_help_text: Be sure to set the maximum size to full width.

children.name: open_text
children.label: Open Text
children.inline_help_text: Here if you want to include a video title or additional text.

children.name: space_above_text
children.label: Space Above Text:
children.inline_help_text: It's best to keep these consistent for every video otherwise you'll have some funky alignment going on.

name: bg_video
label: Background Video:
inline_help_text: IMPORTANT: If you are optimizing this page for SEO (meaning speed and performance) it's best not to use background video. If you're optimizing for UX, have at it.

children.name: clip
children.label: Video Clip:
children.inline_help_text: Must be in an MP4 file type. For best results, optimize your video clip prior to upload (5-10MB is best). The smaller the better.

children.name: vid_pos
children.label: Video Position:
children.help_text: The background video will fill the section and need to do so at a variety of screen sizes and ratios.  This means that a portion of the video will get cropped out.  This just gives you a little more control.
children.inline_help_text: Gives you control over which part of the video you want in view.

children.name: still
children.label: Video Still Image:
children.help_text: This will help if a visitor is on a slow connection and the video takes a moment to load. It will also help hide the flash that happens as the video loops.
children.inline_help_text: Take a screenshot of the first frame of your video.

children.name: video_bg_color
children.label: Video Background Color
children.inline_help_text: Set a background color that mostly closely resembles the color of your video.

children.name: clip
children.label: Video Clip:
children.inline_help_text: Must be in an MP4 file type. For best results, optimize your video clip prior to upload (5-10MB is best). The smaller the better.

children.name: vid_pos
children.label: Video Position:
children.help_text: The background video will fill the section and need to do so at a variety of screen sizes and ratios.  This means that a portion of the video will get cropped out.  This just gives you a little more control.
children.inline_help_text: Gives you control over which part of the video you want in view.

children.name: still
children.label: Video Still Image:
children.help_text: This will help if a visitor is on a slow connection and the video takes a moment to load. It isn't required.
children.inline_help_text: Take a screenshot of the first frame of your video.

children.name: video_bg_color
children.label: Video Background Color
children.help_text: This will help if a visitor is on a slow connection and the video takes a moment to load. It isn't required.
children.inline_help_text: Set a background color that mostly closely resembles the color of your video.

children.name: mod_id
children.label: CSS ID:
children.inline_help_text: Must be unique. Only use one.
